review: I bought this specifically to watch HBO Now because the streaming sucks in a web browser for some reason.  If that's all you want it for, then this is easily a five star device.  The reason I give the device only three stars is because I've owned three of these and all of them will eventually fail to play rented/purchased content from iTunes.  You'll get a media playback failure and you have to turn the device off and on again to get things to work.  It's a real pain and it's ironic because its an Apple device interacting with Apple software, you'd think that would work flawlessly.  It's apparently a known issue if you look on the Apple forums but they've never addressed it.  It's enough of a hassle that I eventually decided the device was not for me and got rid of it.

review: This apple tv is the easiest thing in the world to set up and use. I love the ability to stream from my i-devices directly to my tv through the apple tv. There are also a bunch of apps included on the device like Netflix and Youtube.  I bought one for my parents who are in their 70's. My dad, who barely knows how to operate a tv remote, was able to have this hooked up (plug in and connect HDMI cord) and running in less than 20 minutes. It took me (self proclaimed tech whiz) about 7. I think that says a lot about its ease of use.
